desc: New Resonators: Canterella and Aero Rover.
New Weapons: Whispers of Sirens and Bloodpact's Pledge.
Added: Gusts of Welkin Sonata Effect and 9 new Echoes
New Weapons: Unflickering Valor.
Fixed: Yinlin's Forte scaling.
Added: Enemy Presets since v2.0
New Resonator: Brant.
Added: 5 new Echoes.
Fixed: Added 5 more Sonata Effects for Hecate which can be obtained from boxes.
Fixed: Max Everything button now correctly maxes out Forte levels.
New Resonator: Phoebe.
New Weapons: Luminous Hymn and Ocean's Gift.
Happy Valentine's Day!
New Weapons: Tragicomedy.
Fixed: Frosty Resolve's Glacio DMG Bonus cannot stack.
Fixed: Nightmare: Tempest Memphis' Sonata sets were wrong.
Fixed: Innate stats from 2.0 Echoes are now applied in Setup page.
Updated: Changes the effects of Carlotta's Sequence Nodes.
Updated: Changes Frosty Resolve's 5-Piece effect.
Updated: Forte icons in the Team Setup Page is now clickable.
New Resonators: Carlotta and Roccia.
New Weapons: The Last Dance, Call of the Abyss and Rinascita Craftables.
New Presets: Rinascita Dishes and Sonata are now available.
New Echoes: Rinascita Natives and Nightmares along with 5 new Sonata Effects.
Happy Belated New Year!
Updated: Echo selection now defaults the selected Sonata to the first filtered one.
Updated: Sonata Selection
Added: Buttons for Quick Config
Added: Filter for Sonata and Cost when selecting Echoes
Added: Modifiers Preset for Echoes, Sonata, Dishes and Petrols
Fixed: Base ATK of Weapon's Tooltips in modal were wrong
Added: Ability type below icons for clarity
Added: Now the entire row of modifier can be clicked to toggle the checkbox or focus the text box
Added: Some ATK/DMG buffs that only affect a single ability type now only affects that specific ability
Fixed: Lumi's I2 causing the app to crash
Fixed: Heron and Moonlit Clouds buffs toggled off after leaving page
Fixed: Missing Stellar Symphony's ATK modifier
Fixed: Fusion RES and Glacio RES were swapped
Added: A toggle for ToA Buff
Public launch day
